original_text: and Elijah was sent to none of them but only to Zarephath, in the land of Sidon, to a woman who was a widow.
korean_text: 엘리야가 그 중 한 사람에게도 보내심을 받지 않고 오직 시돈 땅에 있는 사렙다의 한 과부에게 뿐이었으며

sentences.original_text: and Elijah was sent to none of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 엘리야는 그들 중 아무에게도 보내지지 않았고

sentences.original_text: to a woman who was a widow
